host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les systèmes de fichier Amazon Elastic File Systems (Amazon EFS) via l'API Cloudwatch.}
{EN: Template to check Amazon Elastic File Systems (Amazon EFS) volumes using Cloudwatch API.}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Amazon EFS using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Aws-Efs

information.author: Centreon
information.changelog:
- Host disco rule added
- fix HTPL name (EFS to Efs) for compliance

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) service.**

Available host template and related services:

|Cloud-Aws-Efs-Custom
|---|
|Efs-Connections|
|Efs-Datausage|

This Pack provides a host discovery rule.

**Plugin pack pour superviser le service Amazon Elastic File System (EFS).**

Modèle d\'hôte disponible et ses services :

|Cloud-Aws-Efs-Custom
|---|
|Efs-Connections|
|Efs-Datausage|

Ce Pack contient une règle de découverte d\'Hôte.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install centreon-plugin-Cloud-Aws-Efs-Api To use it, you can either install 'awscli' (AWS Command Line Interface) or 'paws' (Perl AWS SDK). ### Install awscli On CentOS, install with following commands: # yum install awscli ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a new host Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

Cloud-Aws-EFS-custom
Click on the *Save* button. ### Host Macro Configuration The following macros must be configured on host:
Macro Description Default value

AWSCUSTOMMODE

Mode used by plugin (awscli or paws)

awscli

AWSSECRETKEY

CloudWatch secret key

AWSACCESSKEY

CloudWatch access key

AWSREGION

Monitoring region

AWSFILESYSTEMID

ID of your filesystem

Click on the *Save* button.
information.name: Amazon EFS
information.status_message: host disco rule and htpl name fix
